item.title: CVE-2022-23056|2024-08-03T03:28:43.275Z -- erpnext -- erpnext
item.description: In ERPNext, versions v13.0.0-beta.13 through v13.30.0 are vulnerable to Stored XSS at the Patient History page which allows a low privilege user to conduct an account takeover attack.
